articles.author: Greg Michalowski
articles.title: The full statement from the Bank of Canada December 2023 rate decision - ForexLive
articles.description: FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE . Media Relations . Ottawa, Ontario . December 6, 2023 . The Bank of Canada today held its target for the overnight rate at 5%, with the Bank Rate at 5¼% and the deposit rate ...
articles.content:
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE
Media Relations
Ottawa, Ontario
December 6, 2023
The Bank of Canada today held its target for the overnight rate at 5%, with the Bank Rate at 5¼% and the deposit rate at 5%.… [+2856 chars]
